sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import HeroImage from './../projectPage/HeroImage.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroImage':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/hero-image.png'), } const a = { 'col':"col-2", 'height':"auto", 'margin':"0px 0px 0px 0px", 'imageMargin':'30px 0px 10px 0px', 'font':"15px", 'image1':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/1.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/2.png'), 'image3':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/3.png'), 'image4':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/4.png'), } const b = { 'height':"auto", 'padding':"20px 10px", 'image1':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/5.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/6.png'), } const c = { 'height':"auto", 'padding':"20px 10px", 'image1':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/7.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/8.png'), } const d = { 'height':"auto", 'padding':"20px 10px", 'image1':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/11.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/12.png'), } const e = { 'height':"auto", 'padding':"20px 20px", 'image1':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/9.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/10.png'), } const f = { 'image1':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/17.jpg'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/16.jpg'), 'image3':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/22.jpg'), 'image4':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/21.jpg'), 'image5':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/18.jpg'), 'image6':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/19.jpg'), 'image7':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/20.jpg'), } const g = { 'image1':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/13.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/peoplePod/15.png'), } function PeoplePod(props) { return(
) } export default PeoplePod;
